title: 25 Years Since Hong Kong Handover
itunes:title: 25 Years Since Hong Kong Handover
description:
Bloomberg's Tom Mackenzie joins hosts Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts after President Xi's visit to the city. Chris Patten speaks to Bloomberg about the erosion of rights in Hong Kong, 25 years after he left as the last British Governor. Plus, former resident Richard Heyes and Bloomberg Opinion columnist Matthew Brooker discuss living and working in the city and why they have both decided to leave. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
